content.text: Emporion a research data hub for social and economic history.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The data and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.

submissionPolicy.text: As a research data hub for social and economic history, Emporion offers a platform for the publication, indexing, and long-term storage of time series, historical statistical and panel data, georeferenced vector data, and text mining analysis results, as well as data papers describing them, in accordance with the FAIR Guiding Principles for Scientific Data Management and Stewardship. Emporion is also open to contributions from the fields of corporate and environmental history and the history of technology.

eprints.comment: This repository is powered by the MyCoRe repository software, see http://www.mycore.de/ for more information.
